attributes.action: answer why I have not got an email allowing my vote to be registered objecting to road pricing
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Why is it I have not got an email so i can confirm my objection to road pricing after eight hours on the deadline day whilst I got a reply on another petition within one minute?

Are number 10 trying desperately to make the figures look not quite so bad?

if you did not get an email to log your objection to road pricing sign this petition now!

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
